snippet: Stephen Curry made six 3-pointers and scored 20 points, leading the United States into the quarterfinals of the FIBA Basketball World Cup with an 86-63 victory over Mexico in Barcelona, Spain.
abstract: United States beats Mexico, 86-63, to move into the quarterfinals of the FIBA Basketball World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry made six 3-pointers and scored 20 points, leading the United States into the quarterfinals of the FIBA Basketball World Cup with an 86-63 victory over Mexico in Barcelona, Spain.

headline.main: Stephen Curry Leads U.S. to Win in FIBA World Cup
